pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - FantasyCricketProgame Privacy Policy Welcome to FantasyCricketProgame. We value your privacy and strive to protect your personal information. This privacy policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the measures we take to ensure your information is protected. Information We Collect When you register or participate in any of our fantasy cricket games, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details. This information is used to identify you as a user and to provide you with our services. We also collect information about your interactions with our platform, including the games you play, the scores you achieve, and your overall performance. This helps us improve our services and provide a better user experience. How We Use Your Information The information we collect is used to enhance your experience on FantasyCricketProgame. We use your personal information to: Register and manage your account Provide customer support Send notifications and updates related to our services Analyze user behavior to improve our platform Conduct surveys and gather feedback We may also use aggregated data that does not identify you individually to understand trends and preferences among our users. Data Security Protecting your personal information is our priority. We implement various security measures to ensure your data is secure. These measures include: Encryption of sensitive data Regular security audits and assessments Access controls to limit who can view your information Secure data storage solutions While we strive to protect your personal information, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with: Service providers who assist us in operating our platform Legal authorities if required by law Third parties in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets These third parties are obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes for which it was disclosed. Accessing and Updating Your Information You have the right to access and update your personal information at any time. To do so, please contact us at fantasycricketprogame@gmail.com. We will respond to your request promptly and ensure your information is accurate and up-to-date. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website. Your continued use of our services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated policy. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at fantasycricketprogame@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing any issues promptly and transparently.
